item.title: Does the Lightning Network Threaten Bitcoin's Censorship Resistance?
item.description:
Does the Lightning Network Threaten Bitcoin's Censorship Resistance?

The Lightning Network may well be Bitcoin's primary solution to the issue of scalability , but many skeptics believe there are unresolved issues with this layer-2 system for the blockchain. The possibility of too much centralization via so-called "supernodes" is one of the common criticisms of the Lightning Network, and attached to that is the fear of these new, mostly -centralized payment hubs having the capacity to censor transactions.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Ends Turbulent Week as Bull Run Fades - CoinDesk
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Ends Turbulent Week as Bull Run Fades - CoinDesk

Markets Weekly is a column analyzing price movements in the global digital currency markets, and the technology's use case as an asset class. Bitcoin prices fluctuated significantly during the week ending 29th April, reaching a yearly high of $470 before falling below $440.

item.title: Algorithmic Improvements Give Bitcoin Mining an AsicBoost
item.description:
Algorithmic Improvements Give Bitcoin Mining an AsicBoost

Timo Hanke, a mathematical researcher and cryptocurrency expert, in collaboration with Sergio Demian Lerner, a renowned security expert, has developed a new Bitcoin mining method that can increase mining revenue by up to 20 percent, translating to an increase of $30 million in annual profits if used by one of the biggest mining pools.

item.title: Hi, I just want to introduce my Openbazaar store here just once. I believe I offer an interesting service. * /r/Bitcoin
item.description:
Hi, I just want to introduce my Openbazaar store here just once. I believe I offer an interesting service. * /r/Bitcoin

Bitcoin is the currency of the Internet: a distributed, worldwide, decentralized digital money. Unlike traditional currencies such as dollars, bitcoins are issued and managed without any central authority whatsoever: there is no government, company, or bank in charge of Bitcoin. As such, it is more resistant to wild inflation and corrupt banks.

item.title: Deloitte Harnesses Facebook Messenger to Put Warranties on Blockchain - CoinDesk
item.description:
Deloitte Harnesses Facebook Messenger to Put Warranties on Blockchain - CoinDesk

Deloitte has used Facebook's recently released Messenger API to build an early version of a product capable of storing warranties on a blockchain and allowing users to buy insurance for items even after they've purchased.

item.title: Bitcoin's Western Union Support, Russia Ban | PYMNTS.com
item.description:
Bitcoin's Western Union Support, Russia Ban | PYMNTS.com

Western Union just put its toe in the bitcoin/blockchain waters. It announced an investment in Digital Currency Group, a bitcoin/blockchain startup-focused investment firm, which includes former Treasury Secretary Larry Summers, who is serving as an advisor and also put money up.

item.title: South Africans Supporters of Alleged Global Bitcoin Scam MMM March On
item.description:
South Africans Supporters of Alleged Global Bitcoin Scam MMM March On

Supporters of MMM, which is accused of being a Ponzi scheme, marched in Soweto, South Africa in celebration of the Financial Freedom Awareness campaign, coinciding with South Africa's Freedom Day, according to Independent Online (IOL), a South African news source.

item.title: Isle of Man Regulator Seeks Rule Change to Ease Bitcoin Gambling - CoinDesk
item.description:
Isle of Man Regulator Seeks Rule Change to Ease Bitcoin Gambling - CoinDesk

The government of the Isle of Man is looking to plug a gap in its gambling regulations as they relate to bitcoin and other digital currencies. Officials are currently weighing regulatory changes that would allow gambling services to accept digital currencies "as if they were cash".

item.title: Bitcoin Trading The Block Reward Halving
item.description:
Bitcoin Trading The Block Reward Halving

Bitcoin price has slowly gained alttude in a non-committal rise to $450. This analyst keeps questioning why the market compulsively buys price up when the technicals are pointing down. Some say that perhaps the market is trading the expectation of a block reward rally. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; The Weekend Ahead - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; The Weekend Ahead - NEWSBTC

Here's what we are looking at in the bitcoin price for this morning out of Europe. The week is about to draw to a close, and it's time for the second of our twice-daily bitcoin price watch analyses. As we have done a few times already this week, let's kick things off with a chart.
